org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.expr
Interface IAeExpressionTypeConverter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeAbstractExpressionTypeConverter, AeDefaultBSFExpressionTypeConverter
public interface IAeExpressionTypeConverter

This interface provides type conversion functionality. Each expression language implementation may need to convert data of certain Java types into other Java types. For example, the Jaxen XPath implementation needs to convert BigInteger and Float objects to Doubles.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object convertToEngineType(java.lang.Object aExpressionType)
          Converts the given expression type (an object created by the expression language library while executing the expression) to a new type that can be used by the BPEL engine.
 java.lang.Object convertToExpressionType(java.lang.Object aEngineType)
          Converts the given engine type (an object coming from the BPEL engine) to a type that can be properly handled by the expression language library.
 

Method Detail
